room_title: Escape room "Colors" by Clue in Newbury
room_description:
The evil wizard, Dar, has a secret. After centuries of trying to destroy the popular and much-loved wizard, Fred, he has found the powerful wizard’s source of magic. Color! Dar has created a spell to remove all color from the world and destroy Fred forever.
Fred has sent out a call for help to the bravest, and most clever adventurers, and you and your friends have been chosen. But there is only one way to break the spell, and Dar has put in many obstacles to keep you from reaching your goal. Can you save Fred, bring color back to the world, and break the spell before it’s too late?
